articles.title: Apple raises $5.5 billion in debt after upbeat earnings, iPhone sales offset fears of a consumer pullback
articles.content: Apple Inc. raises $5.5 billion in a four-part bond deal on Monday, days after reporting upbeat quarterly results tied to robust iPhone sales.

articles.title: Apple earnings can be summed up in one word
